description: Build a 3D force graph visualization with hover tooltips, click interactions to show top matches, and a match explanation panel showing similarity scores and top contributing vector dimensions.

userStories.title: Create SocialGraph component with ForceGraph3D
userStories.description: Create a new SocialGraph component in frontend/components/ that fetches graph data from GET /graph and renders it using react-force-graph-3d
acceptanceCriteria: Component exists at frontend/components/SocialGraph.tsx
Fetches data from http://localhost:4000/graph
Renders ForceGraph3D with nodes and links
Graph displays correctly in the Space tab

userStories.title: Add hover tooltips showing name, age, uni
userStories.description: When hovering over a node, show a tooltip displaying the user's name, age, and university
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering over a node shows tooltip
Tooltip displays: name, age, uni
Tooltip is styled and readable

userStories.title: Click node to highlight neighbor edges and show top matches
userStories.description: When clicking a node, highlight all edges connected to it and display the top 5 matches in a sidebar or panel
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a node highlights its connected edges
Top 5 matches are displayed (by similarity score)
Matches show: name, similarity score, and basic info

userStories.title: Add match explanation panel with similarity score
userStories.description: When a match is selected, show a panel that displays the similarity score between the selected node and the match
acceptanceCriteria: Match explanation panel appears when match is clicked
Panel shows similarity score (0-1 range)
Score is clearly displayed and formatted

userStories.title: Show top 2-3 vector dimensions contributing most to match
userStories.description: In the match explanation panel, calculate and display the top 2-3 vector dimensions that contribute most to the similarity (using absolute diff or dot product contribution)
acceptanceCriteria: Panel shows top 2-3 contributing dimensions
Dimensions are labeled (e.g., 'openness', 'extraversion')
Contribution values are displayed
Uses GET /graph/match/:id1/:id2 endpoint or calculates locally

userStories.title: Ensure chat updates trigger graph refresh
userStories.description: When a user completes the chat onboarding and their vector is updated, the graph should refresh to show updated positions and connections
acceptanceCriteria: After chat updates user vector, graph refreshes
New positions/connections are visible
No manual refresh needed
